title: format
description: The format object can be used with numerical or date fields to provide more detail about how values should be displayed in popup windows.

dateFormat.description: A string used with date fields to specify how the date should appear in popup windows.

digitSeparator.description: A Boolean used with numerical fields. A value of true allows the number to have a digit (or thousands) separator when the value appears in popup windows. Depending on the locale, this separator is a decimal point or a comma. A value of false means that no separator will be used.

places.description: An integer used with numerical fields to specify the number of supported decimal places that should appear in popup windows. Any places beyond this value are rounded.
